data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Vientiane [prefecture], Laos.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vientiane [prefecture], Laos
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 698,300 people living in Vientiane [prefecture].
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Vientiane [prefecture], let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Vientiane [prefecture].
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Cham, Western people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Vientiane [prefecture], Laos. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Vientiane [prefecture], Laos today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Vientiane [prefecture], Laos a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

location.name: Vientiane [prefecture]
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Cantonese, Thai, Thai, Isan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Cantonese (18,000), Thai (143,000), Thai, Isan (8,900)
